programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: BABYMONSTER released their first mini album [BABYMONS7ER]. The title track 'SHEESH' has been well-received by music fans for its confident lyrics, addictive chorus, and grand hip-hop-based sound.

programme.title: YG MV Special

programme.desc: A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original performance videos of the K-Pop artists (BLACKPINK, WINNER, AKMU, iKON, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: Jisoo and Lisa visit a tangerine farm to harvest some fruit while Rosé and Jennie try horseback riding. It is their last day in the BLACKPINK house as their 100 days of vacation comes to an end. The members come together to cook a last supper in the house and share their memories.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: Special BLACKPINK House episode! What have BLACKPINK members been up to the last few months? Watch as BLACKPINK is preparing their comeback and go on about their daily lives.

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: The title track ‘Love Lee’ is characterized by its acoustic sound, rhythmic drums, and sensual vocals. It portrays everyday and relatable subjects through AKMU’s unique and original perspective.

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: KING KONG’ is a dynamic dance track. It incorporates the King Kong story to express a blind love that says, “I know it’s unattainable, but I’ll give my all".
